thread.title: sikkmod -- how do I restore the original flashlight?

post.author: Beyond Within
post.body:
Looks like sikkmod comes with the duct tape mod.

As the title of this thread indicates, I want to restore the original flashlight.

post.author: Sikkpin
post.body: Sikkmod doesn't use the duct tape mod but has an optional headlamp. The original flashlight is still there and untouched (though I think I "yellowed" the texture a bit).

post.author: Beyond Within
post.body: How do you enable the regular flashlight, then?

post.author: BloodRayne
post.body: What do you mean? It's not disabled in Sikkmod, just bind it to whatever key or use the default.

post.author: Beyond Within
post.body:
When I press "F" the "optional headlamp" turns on; the flashlight is
not pulled out.

post.author: Beyond Within
post.body:
Never mind, I see how this works. Sikkmod changes the default
flashlight binding from F to V and assigns F to the headlight.

Just changed it back.

. . .

I should note, the headlight is better than the chest light id added
in Doom 3 BFG.

. . .

Sikkmod + Wulfen + Monoxead is just ridiculous. My visual cortex
cannot even process this much detail.
